text: Roger Fite (13 October 1938 – 28 November 2020) was a French rugby union player. He was born in Cabrerolles, France. Fite made his first international appearance with France on 23 March 1963. After his playing career, Fite became President of the Comité du Limousin. He also sat on the steering committee of the French Rugby Federation. Fite died on 28 November 2020 at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French rugby union players Category:Hérault Category:Sportspeople from Occitanie
title: Roger Fite
